thread.title: Portland State Vikings football vs. Montana State: Live updates, how to watch, listen
thread.title_full: Portland State Vikings football vs. Montana State: Live updates, how to watch, listen | OregonLive.com

author: Scott Sepich | For The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Portland State Vikings football vs. Montana State: Live updates, how to watch, listen
text:
It's a battle of a high-powered offense against a stingy defense when the Montana Bobcats visit the Portland State Vikings on Saturday at Portland's Providence Park.
Will the Bobcats extend their eight-game winning streak against PSU, or will the Vikings snap the streak to continue what has been a charmed season?
Look for live updates in the comments section below as the game unfolds, and quarter-by-quarter updates in this post.
Here's how to watch and follow the game:
What: No. 16 Montana State Bobcats (3-2, 2-1 Big Sky) at No. 17 Portland State Vikings (4-1, 1-1)
When: 12:30 p.m. PDT Saturday
Where: Providence Park, Portland. Capacity: 18,627
TV channel: Root Sports (Comcast: 34/734, CenturyLink: 764/1764 in Portland area; DirecTV: 687; Dish: 412-16/426)
Commentators: Tom Glasgow, Jason Stiles, Jen Mueller
Radio: KPOJ (620)
Forecast at kickoff: Cloudy, 64 degrees
Series history: Montana State leads the all-time series 19-9, and the Bobcats are 7-6 in Portland.
